É triste o que esse jogo se tornou e a produtora não faz nada para reverter. Conheço o jogo há anos, joguei PC, Xbox, Mobile e Steam, e posso afirmar que era divertido num passado distante. A comunidade é extremamente tóxica, você é obrigado a jogar somente com perks metas pois você será campado e tunelado com 5 gens up. Se estiver jogando de killer será obrigado também a jogar somente com perks meta pois se você não regredir e bloquear os geradores de todas as formas possíveis a partida se encerrará em poucos minutos e você não pontuará nada. Não há como fazer builds diferentes e divertidas, pois assim você vai perder! O alto MMR num jogo não competitivo não funciona, mas a produtora finge que trabalha e implementou essa mecânica que te força a ser tryhard em todas as partidas, tornando alto o nível de estresse. Não adiante lançar os mais famosos slashers e killer diferenciados, as partidas são estressantes e cansativas. Antes eu ria e me divertia com meus amigos ao jogarmos juntos, hoje o jogo não é nem minimamente divertido.

I started playing this game in 2017 and it used to be soooooo much fun. Fast forward to the end of 2021..... not so much. The constant grind for bloodpoints was insane before they enabled the new match making system and now it is impossible. As a survivor main on the new match making system I am consistently matched with a killer that wipes out the entire team in just a few minutes or one that will go away just long enough for someone to unhook you so that he can tunnel you. This happened before, but not every game. It is currently a double bloodpoints weekend and the game is unplayable for me. I'm actually getting less bloodpoints than I normally would. 

This game is no longer fun. It feels like a job. Killers scream that it is survivor sided and survivors scream that it is killer sided. In reality I think their match making system wasn't great before and now it is worse. At least with the old system when I hit the red ranks I could intentionally place myself back in the lesser ranks for the fun matches. 

With every update something major in the game breaks and they just leave it broken for weeks because they are focused on pushing out new cosmetics.

The presiding feeling when it comes to DBD for me is just simply disappointment...

I really wish I could enjoy playing it. I really wish I could endure finishing challenges and achievements. I really wish I could enjoy watching my favourite content creators play the game.

I just simply can't, I can't anymore. The inaction and sheer incompetence from Behaviour Interactive just rubs off on every facet of the game, from the extremely shoddy gameplay that gets worse by the chapter, to the extremely toxic community, to the increasing volume of cheaters. Behaviour Interactive have simply become complacent in the state of the game, and do the absolute bare minimum to make sure the money is still coming in, as can be seen in the most recent chapter to go live; a single survivor for £4...

I just feel so disappointed that this game was made by Behaviour Interactive instead of any other developer. This isn't a passion project from BHVR, it's a cash cow that they milk every day for it's worth while totally ignoring everything the community has to say about it.

It would be so simple to earn community goodwill, to improve the game, to do the right thing for the community. But unfortunately, these aren't values that Behaviour Interactive care for... Let's hope some fresh competition can motivate them to do better.

OBS: a Behaviour Interactive Inc. conseguiu destruir a UE4. Prepare-se para ter seu PC fritado com gráficos horríveis...

Recomendo a compra do Friday the 13th: The Game (jogo 100% balanceado) e é da concorrente.
если вы пришли из доты, покупайте лезерфейса, и стойте беред крюком, комментарии в ваш профиль гарантированы!

Die, die and die again, until you can save enough bloodpoints to get perks that will put you in an advantage over the killer. I've been playing this game for a year and half, and overall I can say that survivor is the best over killer because killers aren't my specialty, therefore I am biased. But, a fun game with friends, and once you learn the main mechanics, just try to not get too salty. 

Overall, I'd give this game an 7/10 as a PC player, who frequents this game all the time.

Игра вполне подходит для приятного времяпрепровождения.
Лично мне вполне нравятся и её внешний вид, и то, что в ней необходимо делать. Персонажи выглядят очень приятно. Возможно для серьёзной игры она конечно и не очень подходит, но для того чтобы провести время с друзьями она сгодится. 
В принципе всё.
